contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox football biography | name = Xabi Pascual | image = | fullname = Carlos Xabier Pascual Luca Tena | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1981|7|9}} | birth_place = [[Bilbao]], [[Spain]] | height = {{height|m=1.91}} | currentclub = | clubnumber = | position = [[Goalkeeper (association football)|Goalkeeper]] | youthyears1 = | youthclubs1 = | years1 = 2000–2002 | years2 = 2002–2003 | years3 = 2003–2004 | years4 = 2004 | years5 = 2005 | years6 = 2005–2006 | years7 = 2006–2007 | years8 = 2007–2008 | years9 = 2008–2010 | clubs1 = [[CD Baskonia|Baskonia]] | clubs2 = [[Arenas Club de Getxo|Arenas Getxo]] | clubs3 = [[CA Osasuna B|Osasuna B]] | clubs4 = [[Amurrio Club|Amurrio]] | clubs5 = [[Racing de Santander|Racing Santander]] | clubs6 = [[Real Oviedo|Oviedo]] | clubs7 = [[Racing de Santander B|Racing B]] | clubs8 = [[Barakaldo CF|Barakaldo]] | clubs9 = [[Gimnàstic de Tarragona|Gimnàstic]] | caps1 = | caps2 = | caps3 = 15 | caps4 = 15 | caps5 = 0 | caps6 = 0 | caps7 = 10 | caps8 = 16 | caps9 = 3 | goals1 = | goals2 = | goals3 = 0 | goals4 = 0 | goals5 = 0 | goals6 = 0 | goals7 = 0 | goals8 = 0 | goals9 = 0 | nationalyears1 = | nationalteam1 = | nationalcaps1 = | nationalgoals1 = | manageryears1 = | managerclubs1 = | pcupdate = 00:00, 21 June 2010 (UTC) | ntupdate = }} {{spanish name 2|Pascual|Luca de Tena}} '''Carlos Xabier 'Xabi' Pascual Luca de Tena''' (born 9 July 1981 in [[Bilbao]], [[Biscay]]) is a [[Spain|Spanish]] professional [[Association football|footballer]] who plays as a [[Goalkeeper (association football)|goalkeeper]]. During his career, spent almost exclusively in the lower leagues, Pascual represented [[CD Baskonia]] ([[Athletic Bilbao]]'s third team), [[Arenas Club de Getxo]], [[CA Osasuna B]], [[Amurrio Club]], [[Racing de Santander]] – no appearances for the [[La Liga]] side, playing exclusively for the [[Racing de Santander B|B team]] – [[Real Oviedo]], [[Barakaldo CF]] and [[Gimnàstic de Tarragona]].<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.gimnasticdetarragona.com/cat2/act-noticia.php?id=2868&noticia|title=Deu baixes segures|trans_title=Ten certain releases|publisher =Gimnàstic|language=Catalan|date=23 June 2010|accessdate=6 July 2010}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.bdfutbol.com/en/j/j9327.html BDFutbol profile] *[http://www.futbolme.com/com/jugadores.asp?id_jugador=7782 Futbolme profile] {{es icon}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Pascual, Xabi | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = Pascual, Carlos Xabier | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Spanish footballer | DATE OF BIRTH = 9 July 1981 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Bilbao, Spain | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pascual, Xabi}} {{Spain-footy-goalkeeper-stub}} [[Category:1981 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Bilbao]] [[Category:Sportspeople from Bilbao]] [[Category:Spanish footballers]] [[Category:Basque footballers]] [[Category:Association football goalkeepers]] [[Category:Segunda División footballers]] [[Category:Segunda División B footballers]] [[Category:Tercera División footballers]] [[Category:Arenas de Getxo footballers]] [[Category:Racing de Santander footballers]] [[Category:Real Oviedo players]] [[Category:Barakaldo CF footballers]] [[Category:Gimnàstic de Tarragona footballers]]
